scenes.text: You wake up in your house dormitory, the sun streaming through the window. It's your first morning at Hogwarts.

choices.text: Stay in bed a bit longer

scenes.text: You strike up a conversation with a fellow first year. You feel a little less nervous about the day ahead.
You pull the covers over your head and try to snooze a bit more. Eventually, you hear voices from the common room.
Your head of house is waiting in the common room, holding a stack of timetables. 'Good morning! Here are your schedules for the year.'
The head of house smiles: 'Breakfast is in the Great Hall. Don't be late for your first class!'

choices.text: Thank them and go to the Great Hall

scenes.text: You now have your timetable. The school grounds and classes are open to you!
